tit.cmt: 〔京都府） を追加しました。

sen.j: 石田駅（いしだえき）は、京都府京都市伏見区石田森東町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅である。
sen.e: Ishida Station, located in Ishida-morihigashi-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway station of the Tozai Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway.
Ishida Station, located in Ishida-morihigashi-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility of the Tozai Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.
Ishida Station, located in Ishida-morihigashi-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility of the Tozai Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: プラットホームは1面2線の島式。
sen.e: This station has an island-type platform for 2 tracks.
This station has an island-type platform serving tracks.
This station has an island-type platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: ホームドアが設置されている。
sen.e: The station's platform are equipped with doors on both sides.
The station's platform is equipped with doors on both sides.
The station's platform is equipped with doors on both sides.

sen.j: 東西線の駅は駅ごとにステーションカラーが制定されているが、石田駅のステーションカラーは藍白。
sen.e: Station colors are established for each station of the Tozai Line and that of Ishida Station is indigo-white.
Station colors are established for each station of the Tozai Line, and that of Ishida Station is indigo-white.
Station colors are established for each station of the Tozai Line, and that of Ishida Station is indigo-white.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.cmt: Hino Tanjo-in Templeに修正しました。

sen.j: 京都市東余熱利用センター（東温水プール、東部クリーンセンター、醍醐図書館、水環境保全センター）
sen.e: Kyoto City Higashi Waste Heat Utilization Center (Higashi heated pool, Tobu Clean Center, Daigo Library, Aquatic Conservation Center)
Kyoto City Higashi Waste Heat Utilization Center (Higashi heated pool, Tobu Clean Center, Daigo Library, Aquatic Conservation Center)
Kyoto City Higashi Waste Heat Utilization Center (Higashi heated pool, Tobu Clean Center, Daigo Library, Aquatic Conservation Center)

sen.j: 大受団地ほか、大規模な市営・府営・公団団地群
sen.e: Large-scale apartment complex operated by Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Urban Renaissance Agency including Ouke Apartment Complex.
This large-scale apartment complex operated by Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and the Urban Renaissance Agency includes the Ouke apartment complex.
Ouke-danchi apartment complex and other large-scale apartment complexes operated by Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and the Urban Renaissance Agency

sen.j: 醍醐コミュニティバス(4号以外の全路線)
sen.e: Daigo Community Bus (all routes except for route 4)
Daigo Community Bus (all routes except for Route 4)
Daigo Community Bus (all routes except for Route 4)

sen.j: 2004年（平成16年）11月26日 東西線六地蔵～醍醐間延伸により開業。
sen.e: November 26, 2004 - The station commenced operation in association with the extension of Rokujizo ～ Daigo section of the Tozai Line.
November 26, 2004: The station entered operation in association with the extension of the Rokujizo ～ Daigo section of the Tozai Line.
November 26, 2004: The station entered operation in association with the extension of the Rokujizo - Daigo section of the Tozai Line.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 六地蔵駅(T01) - 石田駅(T02) - 醍醐駅 (京都府)(T03)
sen.e: Rokujizo Station (T01) - Ishida Station (T02) - Daigo Station (T03)
